thread.title: Notes: Wildcats beat Dragons twice in one week
thread.title_full: Notes: Wildcats beat Dragons twice in one week

author:
KATRINA SPINNER-WILSON 
Richmond Times-Dispatch
title: Notes: Wildcats beat Dragons twice in one week
text:
Richmond Times-Dispatch Richmond Times-Dispatch 
Wildcats beat Dragons twice in one week 
Earlier in the season, Deep Run coach Rachel Haislip said Maggie Walker would be one of her team’s toughest opponents. But last Wednesday, the visiting Wildcats (12-2) beat the Green Dragons (7-5) in overtime, 2-1, with goals by freshman Allie Kelleher and junior Lauren Heffron and assists from senior Cora Every and senior Olivia Mazey.
